009package CornerDetection;
010
011import java.util.List;
012
013import ij.IJ;
014import ij.ImagePlus;
015import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
016import ij.gui.Overlay;
017import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
018import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
019import imagingbook.common.color.sets.BasicAwtColor;
020import imagingbook.common.corners.Corner;
021import imagingbook.common.corners.GradientCornerDetector;
022import imagingbook.common.corners.HarrisCornerDetector;
023import imagingbook.common.corners.MopsCornerDetector;
024import imagingbook.common.corners.ShiTomasiCornerDetector;
025import imagingbook.common.corners.GradientCornerDetector.Parameters;
026import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
027import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
028
029/**
030 * This plugin demonstrates the use of gradient corner detectors.
031 * It calculates the corner positions and shows them as a vector overlay
032 * on top of the source image.
033 * 
034 * @see HarrisCornerDetector
035 * @see MopsCornerDetector
036 * @see ShiTomasiCornerDetector
037 * 
038 * @author WB
039 * @version 2022/03/30
040 */
041public class Find_Corners implements PlugInFilter {
042        
043        private enum DetectorType {
044                Harris, MOPS, ShiThomasi;
045        }
046        
047        private static DetectorType Algorithm = DetectorType.Harris;
048        private static int MaxCornerCount = 0;                          // number of corners to show (0 = all)
049        private static Parameters Params = new Parameters();
050
051        private static double CornerMarkSize = 1.0;
052        private static double CornerMarkStrokeWidth = 0.25;
053        private static BasicAwtColor CornerMarkColor = BasicAwtColor.Green;
054        
055        private ImagePlus im;
056        
057        @Override
058    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
059        this.im = im;
060        return DOES_ALL;
061    }
062    
063        @Override
064    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
065        
066                if (!showDialog()) {
067                        return;
068                }
069                
070                GradientCornerDetector detector = null; 
071                switch (Algorithm) {
072                case Harris:
073                        detector = new HarrisCornerDetector(ip, Params);
074                        break;
075                case MOPS:
076                        detector = new MopsCornerDetector(ip, Params);
077                        break;
078                case ShiThomasi:
079                        detector = new ShiTomasiCornerDetector(ip, Params);
080                        break;
081                }
082                
083                List<Corner> corners = detector.getCorners();
084                
085                // create a vector overlay to mark the resulting corners
086                Overlay oly = new Overlay();
087                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter(oly);
088                ola.setStroke(new ColoredStroke(CornerMarkStrokeWidth, CornerMarkColor.getColor()));
089                
090                int cnt = 0;
091                for (Corner c : corners) {
092                        ola.addShape(c.getShape(CornerMarkSize));
093                        //IJ.log(c.toString());
094                        cnt++;
095                        if (MaxCornerCount > 0 && cnt >= MaxCornerCount) break;
096                }
097                
098                im.setOverlay(oly);
099                
100                // (new ImagePlus("Corner Score", detector.getQ())).show();
101    }
102    
103        private boolean showDialog() {
104                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
105                
106                gd.addEnumChoice("Detector type", Algorithm);
107                Params.addToDialog(gd);
108                gd.addNumericField("Corners to show (0 = show all)", MaxCornerCount, 0);
109                gd.addNumericField("Corners display size", CornerMarkSize, 1);
110                gd.addEnumChoice("Corner color", CornerMarkColor);
111                
112                gd.showDialog();
113                if(gd.wasCanceled())
114                        return false;
115                
116                Algorithm = gd.getNextEnumChoice(DetectorType.class);
117                Params.getFromDialog(gd);
118                MaxCornerCount = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
119                CornerMarkSize = gd.getNextNumber();
120                CornerMarkColor = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
121                
122                if(gd.invalidNumber() || !Params.validate()) {
123                        IJ.error("Input Error", "Invalid input");
124                        return false;
125                }       
126                return true;
127        }
128
129}
